name: Dark Lily—A Light Yuri Game
description:
Riri's in a bunch of trouble—she's about to be kicked out of her apartment, and she's just lost her job! But then she meets a beautiful stranger who could change everything.

Dark Lily is a yuri-light visual novel for the PC that explores the healing power of friendship, and new beginnings.

Funded By Fans!

Help us take this story further by supporting our stretch goals. Every donation helps!

$100 total: My Dirty Little Job [LOCKED]
$200 total: A Dark Stranger [LOCKED]
$300 total: Blackmailed! [LOCKED]

Thank you for playing and for your support!

So far we’ve collected $20. <- Thank You!
(We’ll update this figure with each new version of the game.)
Sharing is supporting too!
